ygData.subject: AHA!
ygData.msgSnippet: Reading the 76 or so messages in my mailbox, (after one day on onelist) I have discovered the main reason for my near encumberance   A minotaur axe, and a
ygData.messageBody:
Reading the 76 or so messages in my mailbox, (after one day on onelist) I
have discovered the main reason for my near encumberance A minotaur axe,
and a Shiney Brass sheild add up to about 18 weight if I remember correctly.
replacing the axe with a dirk should easily help me out, thank you for
everyone's help. But is there a good light weight 1H slash weapon I could
afford (around 50plat on me), I would still like to level 1H slash.

p.s. My Bio is long, and states a portion of my Guild's charter. which I
made up )

p.p.s. I always ask people if I can inspect their wares, but if I have some
items for sale I will check out lower level char's stuff on a whim, to see
if they would need whatever I had
